verses.roman:
tabe nityānanda kahe,--ye ājñā tomāra
duḥkha sukha ye ha-uk kartavya āmāra

synonyms: tabe—thereupon; nityānanda—Lord Nityānanda Prabhu; kahe—says; ye ājñā—whatever order; tomāra—Your; duḥkha sukha—distress or happiness; ye—whatever; ha-uk—let there be; kartavya—the duty; āmāra—My.
translation: Thereupon Lord Nityānanda said, "Whatever You order is My duty, regardless of whether it results in happiness or unhappiness.
